mapper.select: SELECT @a:=@a+1 serial_number , evd_id, evd_name, evd_path, tmp_path, case_id, main_type, sub_type, timezone, DATE_FORMAT(acquired_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS acquired_date, md5, sha1, process_state FROM evidence_info a, (SELECT @a:= 0) AS sn WHERE a.case_id = #{case_id} ORDER BY acquired_date
select evd_path from evidence_info where evd_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evidence_info(evd_id, evd_name, evd_path, tmp_path, case_id, main_type, sub_type, timezone, acquired_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{path}, #{tmp_path}, #{case_id}, #{main_type}, #{sub_type}, #{timezone}, now())
